name: Safari Adventure in Maasai Mara
description: Experience the thrill of a safari in one of Africa's most famous national reserves. Witness the Big Five and marvel at the stunning landscapes.

name: Cultural Tour of Nairobi
description: Explore the vibrant culture and history of Nairobi, including visits to museums, markets, and local communities.

name: Mount Kenya Hiking Expedition
description: Embark on a challenging yet rewarding trek to the summit of Mount Kenya, Africa's second-highest mountain.

name: Beach Getaway in Diani
description: Relax on the pristine white sands of Diani Beach and enjoy the crystal-clear waters of the Indian Ocean.

name: Cycling Tour of Hell's Gate National Park
description: Explore Hell's Gate National Park on a thrilling cycling tour, with opportunities to see wildlife and stunning rock formations.

name: Bird Watching Tour in Lake Nakuru
description: Discover the rich birdlife of Lake Nakuru, including flamingos, pelicans, and over 400 other bird species.

name: Camping Safari in Amboseli National Park
description: Experience the beauty of Amboseli National Park with a camping safari, offering close encounters with elephants and stunning views of Mount Kilimanjaro.

name: Rafting Adventure on the Tana River
description: Challenge yourself with an exhilarating rafting adventure on the Tana River, one of Kenya's most scenic rivers.
